long_description: The Geax Saguaro Rigid 29 x 2.2 tire offers 29ers fast-rolling cross-country performance, especially on hardpack. Connected center knobs enable a fast-rolling ride; C-shape knobs on the outside edges give you great traction in corners for predictable handling. Aramid bead seats well and keeps the weight low. Supple 120 TPI (threads per inch) casing helps keep weight low and ensures a lively ride quality.
short_description: The Geax Saguaro Rigid 29 x 2.2 tire offers 29ers fast-rolling cross-country performance, especially on hardpack.
